thread.title: Free flights or accommodation on luxury Kimberley cruisesTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Free flights or accommodation on luxury Kimberley cruisesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Free flights or accommodation on luxury Kimberley cruises Published on : Wednesday, August 26, 2015
Until September 30, 2015, Active Travel is offering free return flights from every Australian capital city or a free night in Darwin on two luxury cruise expeditions along the rugged Kimberley coast in 2016.
Silver Discoverer Offer – free return flights
The free flight offer applies to a 10-night cruise between Darwin and Broome aboard the five-star Silversea Expeditions ship, Silver Discoverer. Departures from both ports are available from March to May, 2016, with the cruise offering pampered guests complimentary butler service, champagne on request, guided excursions ashore, drinks and also a scenic flight over the spectacular Bungle Bungle Ranges.
Bookings for this package made with Active Travel by September 30, 2015, will also receive free return flights from any Australian capital city to connect with the cruise. Fares start at $11,650, per person, twin-share.
Coral Discoverer Offer – free hotel stay
Active Travel’s free hotel accommodation offer applies to 10-night cruise aboard Coral Expeditions’ deluxe vessel, Coral Discoverer, from Darwin to Broome from April to September, 2016. The cruise includes guided land tours, with fares available from $9390 per person, twin-share.
Bookings for this cruise made with Active Travel by September 30, 2015, will also receive a complimentary, one-night stay at a deluxe hotel in Darwin before the voyage.
Both cruises offer breathtaking journeys along the wild Kimberley coast, with highlights including the awe-inspiring 80m-high King George Falls, the diverse marine life of Montgomery Reef, Aboriginal rock art galleries and the amazing spectacle of Horizontal Falls, a rushing 12m tide described by David Attenborough as one of the world’s greatest natural wonders.
